website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price point for latest Bluetooth version. Very small device that fits well in a vehicle.
pros: Pairs more quickly than you might expect
Unit is easy to use right out of the box
Nice option in older vehicles with basic audio systems
Results are very pleasing considering the below average price point
cons: Won't fit all devices because of design of plug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution!
customer_reviews.text: My 2011 Cadillac CTS connects to my phone via Bluetooth for phone calls only. So streaming music is only available through aux. jack. I tried a couple of different wired solutions but they were cumbersome. I tried this with marginal expectations but after a nice long ride to the beach and back today I can report it worked perfectly. And somehow my iPhone 7 was able to switch between the car and the Bluetooth adapter automatically when calls came in. I thought for sure I was going to have to find a way to toggle between the two sources for phone calls. I hope it lasts a while!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Deville

customer_reviews.title: The convenience of bluetooth!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bluetooth receiver..I specifically bought it to plug into electronic nose cancelling headphones..it works fantastic! ..and looks great too..everyone at the range asks me what it is..awesome bluetooth receiver at an amazing price! ..It can also be used to make speakers wireless, and if plugged into a tv, I can play videos from my desktop computer to the tv..
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Works with my iPhone 7 in my Honda Element 2007
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched from iPhone 5 to iPhone 7 and needed a way to connect in my old Honda Element 2007. Tried the dongle wired method without success. Found this Bluetooth receiver. It works very well. Not sure how long the charge will last, it has been 3 days and it is going strong. For less than $10 this is a real good product.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this little device especially for the price. I charged it as soon as it came this morning. After work I unplugged it pulled up Bluetooth on my phone, I pressed and held the Bluetooth button on the device. It popped up on my phone, and it was connected. I plugged it into my car radio and it worked great. Then I tried it with my dewalt radio and it works perfect. Now I can Bluetooth music in my car and my shop. I’m going to buy a couple more of these for stoking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Camenzuli

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. I don't use it for telephone calls because my car plays bluetooth calls, but for some reason my car does not allow blue tooth music, so I bought this! Much better than using a headphone cord, keeps the car looking clean. Came in great for tailgating as well, had music playing in my car while I was outside with my phone in my pocket! Can't go wrong. Battery life seems great. Can use while it is charging. Very clear sound. Easy to connect. Connects automatically now to my phone when I turn it on. Shuts off automatically when not being used. So far have bought two other ones for friends because they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: WaveMan

customer_reviews.title: Works in the car and with Beats!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my phone won't recognize when an aux cord is plugged in anymore so I was left without music in the car and while working out. Thought of a Bluetooth option and this little guy was everything I was wanting. SUPER easy to use (literally just hold the button) and plug it in. Connected easily to my phone via Bluetooth, dud, and the battery life is shown in the upper right hand corner of the screen on your phone, a perk I am really happy about. Sound is great and battery hasn't seem too bad yet either. Excited to finally have my own music back in my life, highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bluetooth adaptor
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new iPhone that doesn’t have an aux cord and my car radio doesn’t have its own Bluetooth... easy to use, easy to connect, works great!! Charge doesn’t last as long as I would’ve hoped.
customer_reviews.author: DWJ

customer_reviews.title: Awful audio quality, garbled- don't use for Music
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy enough to set up and connect, Just charge for a bit, turn the unit on and let your device find and connect to it. The problem I had with the unit was the horrible sound quality. I was using it on a mini jack input on a sony boombox. Just to make sure it was not the boom box, I tested it with a wired connection the wired connection played fine. I tested it with a variety of music from Amazon Prime music and Apple iTunes. Every song was either garbled or not better quality than my iPhone 7 speaker.. Avoid this product no matter how tempting.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin B.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine as a receiver but not a transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I i've got the device and had a chance to test it today. It allows you to have a Bluetooth connec You can insert it to a speaker or a headphone or car and receive sound via Bluetooth. I expected to use it as a sound transmitter to send audio from 3.5 mini jack output to my Bluetooth headphones. It does not work in this way. In that scenario you would need some interface to pick my headphones from the list. It is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K.

customer_reviews.title: Works good but doesn't turn off with car
customer_reviews.text: The main functions are fine, but it's annoying when I turn off the car because it'll keep playing on my phone, even though there's no sound coming from the car speaker. So when I try to resume listening in the house, the track will be five minutes ahead of where I left off in the car because it didn't stop with the car. The solution is just pausing the track on your phone before getting out, but this is a bit annoying. Not disastrous, but very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: CXM

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for our van. Plugged it in after charging it up, just turned the van key on accessory to test it. Worked great. Tried it while on the road a couple days later, audio sounded terrible. Loud buzz too which I was able to reduce by unplugging it from the 12vdc car charger. Don't waste your time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this for my car to allow my iPhone to wirelessly play music and I am loving it! Without a 3.5mm jack on my phone, it gets really annoying when I have a long drive ahead of me and my phone is at 5%. So buying this was a no brainer. The sound quality is great It's super easy to use The feature to turn it off after 12 minutes of no activity is awesome too because then I don't have to worry about draining the battery 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great product!
customer_reviews.text: This turned my old stereo into something much more modern. For the price, it's just great! Sound capture for calls could be better, but I'm in a vanagon and it is two feet away. That it works at all under those circumstances is telling. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play - nice!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived the next day, and was powered and ready to go out of the box (although after testing it, I did charge it for 4hrs per the instructions). I was worried it might not work, but it connected immediately and I was able to start listening to my music without having to mess with an AUX cord (which never works right). Fantastic product - definitely worth the price ... and then some!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. West

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, pairs easily with iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as advertised, though for my intended use it wasn’t quite right. I was hoping for a Bluetooth receiver that would turn on/off with my vehicle, and this one uses a rechargeable battery so it’ll stay on after the car is off and die overnight. Then I have to turn it on again when I turn on the car. This is NOT a problem with the product, it unfortunately didn’t fit my specific use case. Audio quality was very good though, so I’m planning to keep it for other uses around the house!
customer_reviews.author: ///M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten multiple Bluetooth devices on Amazon (for me, friends, family members etc). This is the ONLY one that didn’t work AT ALL. Don’t waste your money like me 😩
customer_reviews.author: Stella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Updated - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! I was concerned that the battery life was too short and gave it a bad review. I was contacted to try a new one. This one will last 4 hours using it non stop. It is important to charge it over night the first time you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Flipper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: I use this my car to listen to podcasts and music. It was easy to set and easy to use. I connect to my iPhone and it sounds just great through my car speakers. It has a single aux plug so if you have left and right plugs you will a single to dual adapter cord. I highly recommend this if you are looking for an inexpensive was to connect to your auto speakers.
customer_reviews.author: CK FROM KC

customer_reviews.title: Aux problem fixed !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Bluetooth adapter because my car aux isn’t working properly with the aux cable. This Bluetooth adapter fixed my problem. I can now cruise around with my music playing. Arrived promptly, very easy to connect to your device. I use it to play music only. I don’t really know about the battery life since I just got it. I’m very happy with my purchase. I would highly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Claribel

customer_reviews.title: DOA.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year back. Just took it out of the box and it does not work at all. I can get it to power up only with the charger cable attached at all times. I should have tried it straight away, but I didn't have my project car on the road yet. Well that's how it goes. You get what you Pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Positive Features: This Item gives pure sound when play the music - clear voice when making phone calls to the speaker and the second party - automatically restarts the music when the call is finished Negative Features :You have turn on the item every time it turn off ( if you didn't use it in three-minute )
customer_reviews.author: Wafi Masri

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our truck when we go on camping trips. A lot of times when we are driving we cannot get a radio station that comes in very well. I wanted something so we can listen to music on my phone through the truck radio without wires. I haven’t tried it yet in our truck but it works great through our campers stereo system.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with 3 of my basic Bluetooth headphones.. waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Wont connect to any Bluetooth headphones I have ?? What's the point ?? If it can't connect to any Bluetooth devices ??? Just keeps flashing !!! Waste of time and money. Tried everything . Can't get any closer. Won't connect to any headphones !!! My phone found all of them,, this device sucks !!!
customer_reviews.author: ikie

customer_reviews.title: I was excited until it didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t connect to my iPhone 8 and wouldn’t fit into my aux, the metal connection piece wasn’t long enough to produce sound out of both speakers. ( used a friends phone to connect) Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it mostly. Only 4 stars because it powers off after being disconnected for several minutes even when plugged in so you have to turn it back on every time you get back into the vehicle. Minor inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy to use, has a next and back wheel on top which is cool. Same button for off and on. Just hate the volume max ...I have great speakers and I would really like to hear my bass. Ride with your windows up folks, other than that great product :)
customer_reviews.author: SistaSmurf

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: It did NOT work at all’ I was very upset .. I haven’t had time to make a review since I Order and pay for fast delivery for New Years for Other items’ it was included For my husbands present and it did not turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Our RV has no USB plugin, which required me to play music using an aux cable. When you add a separate charging cable, the creates clutter in the dash. This allows us to play music via Bluetooth. In the RV this is great because I can turn on the outdoor speakers, keep my phone with me outside the RV while streaming music through this device. I will likely buy another for my Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: B. Leath

customer_reviews.title: Great for non-Bluetooth vehicles
customer_reviews.text: If your own a vehicle with MP3 headphone port - Bluetooth this is an awesome device. Great handsfree for Music, Calls & Directions from your phone. Battery is good. It all depends on your usage. If its just for Calls and\or directions its great to awesome. Music & Calls, expect a drop. Plug it in to a charger, while using it, takes care of any power worries.
customer_reviews.author: RD Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Receiver / Hands-free Car Kit, Esuper Portable 3.5mm Bluetooth Aux Adapter Wireless
customer_reviews.text: IM REALLY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. IT CHARGED QUICKLY AND THE SOUND IS JUST GREAT. I CAN TALK ON IT AND LISTEN TO MY MUSIC. BY WAY THE SIZE IS JUST GREAT. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Daya

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. Easy to use, literally just plug it in and turn it on. The Bluetooth connected without a problem and the sound quality is the same as through an aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Safford

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Using it in my vehicle. Easy to pair. Works great with my vehicle. Great sound. Volume is fine. Can use it and charge at the same time which is a huge plus. Does not stick out very far. Blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Connects quickly 95% of the time. Somewhat finicky thereafter. Requires re-initializing periodically. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great for older cars. The sound quality is good. It's not that loud but it lasts forever. I had it in my car that was broke down for 4 months and its still working.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: THis product works
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, clear sound. Used it on my daily commute. no issues. My car is older and doesn't have a built in blue tooth connection, this little thing does the trick. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had the same device a few years ago. So i was firm about my buy. Good quality and easy to use. Just be careful to snap the 3.5mm off because stuff like that happen if you hit it by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Ezz E

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with the small size and simple function. At the same time, it has a number of functions that I won't care to use, but it's nice to have the ability. Pairing has been very easy from one phone to another. It just barely fits my 3.5mm aux jack in my 2011 Subaru Outback. Make sure it's plugged all the way in. I almost thought it wouldn't stay in place; it felt loose. But it stays with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The aux adapter broke inside of aux insert and now i cant get it out! Only had this device for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I can eliminate the aux cable in my car and still stream music on my smart phone. I only gave it 4 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I need it to. I can eliminate the aux cable in my car and still stream music on my smart phone. I only gave it 4 stars because a battery indicator would be nice and the option to play / pause songs from the receiver would have been great too. For ten bucks I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my husband to use at work. we bought several brands and seemed to have to replace them every other month as they would wear out and you couldnt hear anymore. this one lasted the longest at about 6 mo life span
customer_reviews.author: Jleighk

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money...
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this into my stereo's headphone jack to use with my bluetooth headphones. Lights come in and everything but I'm stuck in "pairing mode" and can't seem to pair my headphones to the device. Odd because my headphones will pair to every other bluetooth device no problem. I even tried different headphones and a different headphone jack and still nothing. Seems like a waste of my money now that I can't use it for anything...
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Great product but after a year it stopped working completely which was totally unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Bezabed Y. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product great value music or voice car or home stereo
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfect solution! I'm able to listen to my music with absolute clarity. If call comes in music on pause, your ringtone, clear conversation after call completed music resumes where you left off. This is model HK009 with some added bells and whistles, I had HK008 for three years. I just wore out the prong to plastic connection carrying it from the car to the house and back works well with home stereo without Bluetooth .So I bought two this time!
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, compact, elegant compared to most Bluetooth adapters
customer_reviews.text: I love this device surprisingly this device can survive being washed multiple times an still work. 10/10 I would buy this again if I needed to replace the one I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A mini only device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with a pair of headphones that had a detachable cord. So That I could pair it with my Fire TV box. It works but can only get sound on side of my phones. Not stereo! Only mono!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonite55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I've had mine for a little over a year still works great, great price, bought an extra unit to recommend to my parents, delivery was great with prime order
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok. As expected, the sound is not as good as a wired connection. It is easy to use. The shape is a little awkward. I rated as I did because I would not buy it again, but it works ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Despite being one of the cheaper receivers I found, this thing sounds better than the one I have in my car, which cost about twice as much. So far, I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: More convenient than an aux cord but sound quality is not as good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bluetooth receiver so I could get rid of the aux cord in my car but be able to play Spotify. I previously had a cord from Dollar Tree and it was louder than this receiver and sounded just as good. I like the convenience but I expected this product to sound better than a dollar tree aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you hate using your aux cord all the time. Easy to use and charges pretty fast. Mine stays charged for about a week & half.
customer_reviews.author: Leeah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little device
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The receiver connects like any other bluetooth device. It makes old headphones and speakers bluetooth enabled beautifully. I chose this particular product because of the shape, which its curves are better for headphones. Sound quality and packaging are great. I'd say though the price should be a little cheaper and it could have a longer battery life. Overall I'm pretty satisfied with I got.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good and works as expected. Only thing I’d like to point out is, when you get off the vehicle you have to turn it off manually if not it keeps playing music. And if you get calls, you won’t hear them as it would be ringing on this Bluetooth device. Other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life quickly winnows down to nearly nothing
customer_reviews.text: Hey. For 9 bucks this device is well worth it. Plan on purchasing this item, again, in a couple months because after two or three months of repeated charging the battery will die on your commute to work. Yes. After a couple months the things is trash. But! Since you can barely buy a pack of batteries for 9 dollars its well worth the price. It connects quickly and retrofits a less expensive system with Bluetooth capability. Pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: pamela kinneman

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Samsung S7 Edge. Phone finds it automatically. Can skip forward or rewind a song with the jog wheel on top. Holds a charge for a good while and it auto shuts off to save battery when not in use, which is good for me as I tend to forget to hold the power button down to shut it off. For the price, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works good. Exactly as described. Finally get to throw away the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Low tone, so it not very loud and people I have called on it said they couldn't here me because it Static and I sounded far away. Don't waste your time or money the one I found in 5 and below after I bought this one works 20times better.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Easy pair. I order 2, and we use them both. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hess

customer_reviews.title: It’s important to know that it really works. I do recommend this device to anyone who needs one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really been great help to me. It connects to both of my devices a gives out great sound. I wish the battery life was much longer but it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Slater

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use except battery dies and you have to jack the volume up to 100 to hear anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2009 Toyota, so I don’t have Bluetooth, but I do have an aux outlet. I really like this bc I can attach my phone so quick and easy, since I don’t have an aux plug in on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've got two of these now. Both are attached to older stereos with audio in jacks. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gear User

customer_reviews.title: Does the job - easy switch and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older car that doesn't have Bluetooth, so in order to play music from my phone I had to use an aux cord. Switching to a Bluetooth aux receiver was great! No more cord so the phone can be anywhere in the car; even passengers in the backseat can use their phone on the speakers. Sound quality is great, no issues with connection and the battery lasts decently long. My phone connects automatically now when I power on the Bluetooth receiver, so connection is very quick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No cords!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome device to use to supplement having to have extra cords in the car console. Bluetooth receiver for your phone that allows you to be cordless. Well worth the price and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Small and Simple
customer_reviews.text: This little gem ended up making the perfect addition to my guitar pedalboard. I was looking for something small that could stay plugged into the a aux input so I could easily use my tablet to play music into the rig for me to play along to and practice with. As you can see from the pic I didn't have a lot of room available, but it fits in there quite nicely. It performs flawlessly and on top of that it didn't cost much. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian George

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, great Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.text: It’s all around a great product for the price!! connects quickly, only have to hold the button for about 3 seconds to turn off and there is a slide button on it to change the songs if you don’t wanna look at your phone while driving. Blinks red and blue when in pairing mode. Best product for the price in my educated opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product !
customer_reviews.text: I received my package within 4 days.. and it included an opportunity to receive a free gift card! It's super easy to use, and sound quality is great! It also works while charging, so I just leave it plugged in 24/7. I recommend for anybody looking for something worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Briana K.

customer_reviews.title: This item does the same as the previous one sent ...
customer_reviews.text: This item does the same as the previous one sent. It will not charge. I tried it with the cord sent and other cords I have. I tried it in the car and in the house to no avail. I followed the instructions. What am I doing wrong? It worked fresh out the package. I charged it as instructed and it work the first time in the car. Now it appears not to want to charge.
customer_reviews.author: James K Latigue

customer_reviews.title: Product came in a timely manner and does exactly what was described in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely manner and does exactly what was described in the description.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Works great connects fast if device is on, would be better if it turned on when the radeo turned on and off when the radeo turned off but other then that its pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bluetooth device. Not great design
customer_reviews.text: Should have cane with extension cord for the case when aux port is inside glove box or under arm rest. Does not automatically connect when the car is on. Kinda annoying to have to manually turn it on every time u get in the car.
customer_reviews.author: asoubadet

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Battery life isn’t very long but I can just plug it in to charge whenever so it’s not a huge deal. Otherwise it works well.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoticEight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice so far. Extremely clear audio and easy to use. I keep it plugged in charging in my car because it powers on and off on its own, via the car turning on and off, which allows me not to be concerned about the battery of the Bluetooth receiver. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Hilborn

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Just plug this into your AUX port in your car, pair you bluetooth devices to it and go. So simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine I. Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Works grest
customer_reviews.text: This newer version don’t allow you to plug a headset into it. Otherwise it is wonderful for the price
customer_reviews.author: Wildman

customer_reviews.title: This thing actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a simple little device that actually works!! Does a great job!! I was surprised too :) Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.author: hugh regalado

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I and plugged it in to my car to charge as the instructions stated. The little red light blinked for a bit then it went out. I then took it in to charge in the house but still nothing. The next morning I tried one last time in my car again only to get same results. Never worked so I just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price, battery runs out a little quicker than I thought it would. Make sure to shut it off manually before you get out of you car to prolong usage between charges. Great quality comes through!
customer_reviews.author: Addison Potter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for it’s described job! It is so much easier than dealing with an aux. My only complaint is that by the time it beaps for a low battery, you have literally 15 seconds to plug it in before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: AllyCat

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice order now
customer_reviews.text: What can I say works great on my Milwaukee M18 job site radio. Plugged it in my auxiliary port I no longer have to dock my phone to the radio I can carry it on me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is looking to have Bluetooth capabilities on a radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst product for price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bluetooth for my Car. So, while driving for my work, I can make important phone calls. But I can barely hear anything on call. Not only that, th other person also couldn't figure out what I am talking. I have to go back to my wired headphone. Very poor quality product. I hope I can return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: SUN

customer_reviews.title: Low Volume
customer_reviews.text: Your mileage may vary, but I had to return mine because when using it in my car the volume on the radio had to be turned up to 40 (the highest setting) in order to hear it at all. I ended up finding my older Bluetooth receiver and it worked fine (so I know it wasn't the vehicle's problem). It seems sturdy and well made, it just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Sound too low
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is bad! I use an aux cord and it multiplies volume by 15x! And I had it to max volume! Work on amplification of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Green

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This item work perfect 👌 for my 2010 Mercedes-Benz c300 very small and amazingly beautiful the sound is that very loud but very clean on words
customer_reviews.author: Jorge B

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The volume is a little low... But it does the job
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This little device works great! The battery does not last very long, but it can be used while it is charging.
customer_reviews.author: MsOnyxx

customer_reviews.title: good at first 👌
customer_reviews.text: works well at first, after 6 months it wont hold a charge. and had a loud tone when charging while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Greg gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I could not for the life of me or my teenage boys figure out how to make this work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no genius by any stretch of anyone's imagination, but I could not for the life of me or my teenage boys figure out how to make this work! After much frustration, I just ordered a different product.
customer_reviews.author: JustMeDawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. I have an older car that does not have bluetooth so leave this plugged into the jack and plugged into the charger so it is always charging.
customer_reviews.author: TARYNWILKIE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth device is a great price and is pretty quality. The sound quality is great and I have no complaints. It sounds just as good as if I was plugged into an aux port. There is no noise unless you plug it in to the charge while listening to it. I was disappointed when first plugging it in that the battery died shortly after☹️ But charging it for a night will fix that. Overall the product is good and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jason benninger

customer_reviews.title: Works well, battery not so much
customer_reviews.text: Works well, battery dies too quick and doesnt always charge properly
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: bad sound quality! SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for more than a year and I barely use it. I use it in the car and I'm unable to turn my volume all the way up. Also, it picks up some weird sound waves, so while listening, you can barely hear anything. Also, after a while, it won't plug in properly and there will be barely any sound.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Charged 5x, and now it will no longer hold a charge. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: John Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Loses half the volume when used compared to just an auxiliary wire.
customer_reviews.author: Shuler Construction

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Why replace your entire head unit when this little gadget is perfect. Easy to use and pair. Sound quality is perfect, no static and has decent range. We have one in the car and one on the boat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Reese

customer_reviews.title: sound quality
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality is horrible. trying to stream music from my iphone xr through my nissan car bose system & the sound was very staticky...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Though it worked great at first, sadly it died a few months after purchasing. The seller was very helpful with the refund, maybe it was just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Best In Car Receiver For Calls & Streaming Music! Excellent Value at Price Point!
customer_reviews.text: This receiver does EVERYTHING as described. I use this in my work van daily and I'm able to stream music and make/receive hands free calls. When streaming music, the device pauses for the call them resumes when finished. I can't say anything more than wow! Excellent receiver! I highly recommend! 5 stars all the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Cheeks II

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. No complaints this was. Will buy again!!!!!! And it only took 1 day to receive
customer_reviews.author: twyone

customer_reviews.title: Fast upgrade for your car audio
customer_reviews.text: Perfect easy to use and install Great value for the money and great quality
customer_reviews.author: sandi rafael nunez

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of all the cords connecting my phone, aux, charger etc in my car. This eliminates the need for one of those cords at least and I love it. Easy to connect to and the sound quality is just fine, I'm not picky about that so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Receiver / Hands-free Car Kit, Esuper Portable 3.5mm Bluetooth Aux Adapter Wireless Music Streaming for Home, Car Audio System, Headphone, Speaker( Bluetooth 4.2,A2DP,40feet Bluetooth Range)
product_meta.description:
Introduction:
Play music wirelessly from your phone or other bluetooth devices on your home /car stereo system or when driving with this Bluetooth audio receiver. 
Enjoy the high-quality audio streaming from your phone or other Bluetooth audio transmitter in CD-quality sound through your speaker. 
Freedom to move freely in your house or your car as you listen – conveniently control and stream music from up to 30 feet/10 meters away. 

Feature:
3.5mm audio interface, connect AUX directly Easy to install - simply plug it into your stereo, then connect to your device with just one press of a button.
Bluetooth hands-free, safe driving
LED light indicator, play/pause music, answer/drop phone calls, stereo sound, professional experience
Memory pairing, dialed the last number
Multifunctional keyboard (adjust volume conveniently)
Easy operation: You can answer phone calls or control music on the receiver. Change volume, play/pause music, answer/drop calls, redial the last called number with ease.

NOTE: 
This receiver doesn't turn on automatically,please long press the MF button about 3 seconds,the blue LED light flashes per 5 seconds when it's connected successfully.

Specification:
Working range: 10m（Free space）
Frequency: 2.4GHz-2.48GHz
Battery capacity: 100mh/3.7V working time 6 hours Charing time 2 hours
S/N Ratio: ＞95dB
Working temperature: -10°~+50℃
Size: 5.6x3.6x0.8inches
Unit Weight: 5.3 ounces

Package Included:

1 X HK009 Bluetooth Receiver
1 X USB charging cable

Guaranteed reliability:
We believe in our products,that's why we back them all with an 18 months warranty and provide friendly and easy-to-reach support
Please feel free to contact our team for any questions, we will get back to you within 24H 
Free lifetime technical support
feature_bullets: [Wireless Audio Stream] Bluetooth receiver allows you to wirelessly stream audio from your Bluetooth enabled devices to your existing wired home stereo systems, speakers, or headphones. Ideal for car or home speakers, you can also enjoy high-fidelity stereo audio through headphones.

[Hands-Free Calling] Built-in microphone makes talking to family and friends a breeze. Perfect for hands-free calling when driving. Simply connect your ear buds once the Bluetooth receiver car kit is synced to a device be blown away as they turn into hands-free Bluetooth headphones.Output clear, crisp audio up to 44ft from your device.

[Chargeable and Easy Control] This portable Bluetooth 4.2 receiver car kits can be charged while working. And it gives you simple control listening experience just simply turn up/ down the volume, play and pause music, or answer phone calls without using the smartphones.

[Auto-reconnection and Long Distance] Esuper HK009 could connect your last paired Bluetooth device automatically while pairing mode. Also equipped with the latest Bluetooth technology for a strong, stable connection up to 40 feet in open space without obstacles. Our Online customer service: 5PM-1AM(Your local time)

[Compact and Wide Compatibility] Esuper mini Bluetooth audio receiver is space-saving designed for convenient use with a variety of devices. Equipped with Bluetooth 4.2 technology, this Bluetooth audio adapter is compatible with most smartphones, ideal for home or vehicle audio systems. Please do not attempt to pair it with Bluetooth headphones or Bluetooth speakers as the gadget functions as a Bluetooth receiver instead of a Bluetooth transmitter.
